Utils

Class ConfigCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.ConfigCreator

  • public class ConfigCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    class used to create a full configuration from a batchfile those are list of sentences, word list, XMLs for sphinx and sphinx based, language models etc.
    Author:
    7twiefel

        creates a sub data set randomly from a batch file
        Parameters:

        batchfile - name of batchfile
        contentInPercent - partition of whole data set in percent
        session - provide a session number if there are more sessions
